DOC.brief_title: Platform Medical Information Extraction From Incomplete Data
DOC.detailed_description: Because increase adoption Electronic Medical Record ( EMR ) system , data access EMR convenient . However , still difficulties analyze clinical data directly due large number record use narrative format . In order perform research smoothly , process information extraction require translate data clinical text available format analysis statistic . In medical research , problem miss data occurs frequently . It important develop method good imputation performance stability accuracy . The purpose project provide data integration extraction method handle structure unstructured data source efficient way , provide validation scheme facilitate data review extracted result produce information extraction module , increase quality clinical data compare data different data source correct data error inconsistent , handle clinical data property time series incompleteness , increase accuracy data analysis increase quality health care improve completeness correctness clinical data , provide flexibility method platform . In project , disease topic focus liver cancer patient ' clinical data hope method project extend handle disease replace knowledge model future .
